headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) Unveils New Microscopes At M&M Conference
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) recently unveiled two new electron microscopes, Scios 3 and Talos 12, at the Microscopy & Microanalysis conference, reinforcing their advanced technology offerings. The company's stock rose 17% last month, a period marked by major indexes like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq hitting new highs, largely driven by stronger corporate earnings and economic optimism. Thermo Fisher also announced the FDA approval for their Oncomine Dx Express Test and a partnership expansion...

headline: CFOs On the Move: Week ending July 25
summary: BankUnited hires a Wells Fargo exec to succeed its longtime CFO, Thermo Fisher announces CFO retirement and successor appointment and Patreon names its first finance chief.
